Key Match Events: Otto López hit a solo homer over the center field wall
Connor Norby homered and drove in three runs
Xavier Edwards and Nick Fortes had two hits each
Jesús Sánchez added an RBI single in the sixth
López hit a solo homer in the seventh
Griffin Conine and Fortes scored on Turner’s throwing error in the seventh
Pre-Game Insights: Miami snapped NL East-leading Philadelphia’s six-game winning streak
The Marlins added four new players to the roster
Javier Sanoja made his major league debut with a pinch hit appearance in the seventh
Marlins manager Skip Schumaker mentioned the clubhouse situation
Phillies manager Rob Thomson commented on Aaron Nola’s performance
Post-Match Reflections: Marlins manager Skip Schumaker praised the team’s effort
Philadelphia’s Kyle Schwarber hit a tying sacrifice fly
Philadelphia’s Aaron Nola allowed five runs and nine hits over 4 2/3 innings
Miscellaneous Highlights: Marlins starter Darren McCaughan allowed three runs and six hits in 4 2/3 innings
Philadelphia’s catcher J.T. Realmuto has some swelling but will remain with the club
Marlins placed RHP Max Meyer and RHP Calvin Faucher on the 15-day injured list
Marlins OF Derek Hill was placed on the 10-day injured list
Marlins LHP Andrew Nardi was transferred to the 60-day injured list
Others: Trainer’s room updates provided for both teams
RHP Seth Johnson will make his major league debut for the Phillies on Sunday
The Marlins have not announced a starter for the series finale
